languages.text: This creature has limited combat experience, and is expendable in most cases. They gain small {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}.
languages.original_text: Это существо обладает ограниченным боевым опытом и чаще всего служит "расходным материалом". Оно получает незначительные {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} к {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитию брони{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижению уклонения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}снижению парирования{/g}.

traits.locale_text: This creature has limited combat experience, and is expendable in most cases. They gain small bonuses to damage, armour penetration, dodge reduction, and parry reduction.

traits.locale_text: Это существо обладает ограниченным боевым опытом и чаще всего служит "расходным материалом". Оно получает незначительные бонусы к урону, пробитию брони, снижению уклонения и снижению парирования.
Это существо обладает ограниченным боевым опытом и чаще всего служит "расходным материалом". Оно получает незначительные бонусы к урону, пробитию брони, снижению уклонения и снижению парирования.

languages.text: Diese Kreatur hat begrenzte Kampferfahrung und ist in den meisten Fällen entbehrlich. Sie erhält kleine {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichen-Reduktion{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}Parieren-Reduktion{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature has limited combat experience, and is expendable in most cases. They gain small {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Diese Kreatur hat begrenzte Kampferfahrung und ist in den meisten Fällen entbehrlich. Sie erhält kleine Boni auf Schaden, Rüstungsdurchdringung, Ausweichen-Reduktion und Parieren-Reduktion.

languages.text: Cette créature n'a qu'une expérience limitée du combat et peut généralement être remplacée. Elle bénéficie de petits {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}réduction de parade{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature has limited combat experience, and is expendable in most cases. They gain small {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cette créature n'a qu'une expérience limitée du combat et peut généralement être remplacée. Elle bénéficie de petits bonus de dégâts, de pénétration d'armure, de réduction d'esquive et de réduction de parade.

languages.text: 此生物的战斗经验有限，绝大多数情况下仅仅是炮灰而已。此生物造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}较低，拥有少量{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}招架减免{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。
languages.original_text: This creature has limited combat experience, and is expendable in most cases. They gain small {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 此生物的战斗经验有限，绝大多数情况下仅仅是炮灰而已。此生物造成的伤害较低，拥有少量护甲穿透、闪避减免与招架减免加值。

languages.text: Esta criatura tiene experiencia de combate limitada y por lo general es prescindible. Tiene {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} pequeñas a su {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}reducción de parada{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature has limited combat experience, and is expendable in most cases. They gain small {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Esta criatura tiene experiencia de combate limitada y por lo general es prescindible. Tiene bonificaciones pequeñas a su daño, penetración de armadura, reducción de esquiva y reducción de parada.

languages.text: この生物は戦闘経験が浅く、ほとんどの場合使い捨てとみなされる。彼らは{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}受け流し減少{/g}に少しの{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得る。
languages.original_text: This creature has limited combat experience, and is expendable in most cases. They gain small {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}.

traits.locale_text: この生物は戦闘経験が浅く、ほとんどの場合使い捨てとみなされる。彼らは{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}受け流し減少{/g}に少しの{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得る。

languages.text: Bu yaratık, sınırlı savaş deneyimine sahiptir ve çoğunlukla kolayca gözden çıkarılabilir. {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Hasar{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}zırh delme{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}kaçınma azaltımı{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}savuşturma azaltımı{/g} değerlerine az miktarda {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuslar{/g} kazanır.
languages.original_text: This creature has limited combat experience, and is expendable in most cases. They gain small {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}.
